scripts.build: npm run proto:generate && mkdir -p dist && cp src/harpy.js src/harpy.d.ts dist/ && printf 'export * from "./harpy.js";\n' > dist/index.js && printf 'export * from "./harpy";\n' > dist/index.d.ts
scripts.proto:generate: pbjs -t static-module -w es6 -o src/harpy.js ../../proto/harpy/v1/harpy.proto && pbts -o src/harpy.d.ts src/harpy.js
